name: Palak Paneer
description: A smooth spinach curry served with paneer, seasoned with garam masala and other spices.
steps: Blanch spinach in hot water, then cool and blend into a fine paste.
Fry paneer cubes until golden, set aside.
In the same pan, saut√© onions, tomatoes, garlic, and ginger until soft.
Add the spinach paste, spices, and a little water to the pan.
Simmer for 10 minutes, then add fried paneer.
Cook for another 5 minutes, then serve hot with naan or rice.
tips: Add a pinch of sugar to the spinach while cooking to preserve the bright green color.
Don't overcook the paneer as it can become tough and chewy.
Adding a little cream at the end can make the curry richer and smoother.
